CustomField.description: Returns true if this is a revenue opportunity that was closed within 7 days the account purchased for the first time.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND(CloseDate-7 <= Account.First_Purchase_Date__c, ISPICKVAL(Type,'Revenue Opportunity'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won')) , True, False)
CustomField.label: First 7 Days of Purchases
